courses.title: Guess The Language!
courses.body: Different programming languages have unique syntax and use cases. In this section, you'll identify which language a given code snippet belongs to.

courses.title: Fix The Code!
courses.body: Debugging is an essential skill in programming. In this section, you'll identify the problem in a given code snippet.

courses.title: Complete The Code!
courses.body: Fill in the blank questions test your understanding of programming syntax and logic. Choose the correct code to complete the snippet.

courses.title: Add And Subtract!
courses.body: Master the basics of arithmetic by practicing addition and subtraction problems.

courses.title: Multiply And Divide!
courses.body: Learn multiplication and division techniques to strengthen your math skills.

courses.title: Squares And Roots!
courses.body: Explore square numbers and square roots to deepen your mathematical understanding.

courses.title: Synonyms!
courses.body: Enhance your vocabulary by learning synonyms for common words.

courses.title: Antonyms!
courses.body: Expand your knowledge of language by discovering opposite words.

courses.title: Find The Word!
courses.body: Fill in the blank questions test your vocabulary and understanding of word usage. Choose the correct word to complete the sentence.
